mapper.select: select s.* from order_role t left join order_main s on t.orderid=s.id where t.roleid = #{roleid} and t.addtime > #{timeParam}
SELECT * FROM order_role ore WHERE 1=1 AND ore.orderid = #{id} AND ore.roletype = 'ROLE_ARRIVE_TRANSIT' AND ore.destaddress = #{destaddress} AND ore.desttype = 'TRANSITCERTER'
mapper.insert:
select LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into order_role ( orderid, roleid, roletype, isfinish, actionfinishtime, isshow, srctype, srcaddress, srcaddrname, srcaddrdesc, srcgps, desttype, destaddress, destaddrname, destaddrdesc, destgps, addtime, arrivedtime) values ( #{orderid}, #{roleid}, #{roletype}, #{isfinish}, #{actionfinishtime}, #{isshow}, #{srctype}, #{srcaddress}, #{srcaddrname}, #{srcaddrdesc}, #{srcgps}, #{desttype}, #{destaddress}, #{destaddrname}, #{destaddrdesc}, #{destgps}, now(), #{arrivedtime})
mapper.select:
select oud.roleid from order_role oud where 1=1
and oud.orderid =#{pd.id}
mapper.delete: delete from order_role where orderid= #{orderid} and roletype = #{roletype}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM order_role ora WHERE 1=1 AND ora.orderid = #{orderid} AND ora.roletype = 'ROLE_TRANSIT_SEND'
SELECT * FROM order_role ora WHERE 1=1 AND ora.orderid = #{orderid} AND (ora.roletype = 'ROLE_TRANSIT_SEND' OR ora.roletype = 'ROLE_AIRPORT_SEND') AND ora.isfinish = 'UNFINISHED' LIMIT 1
SELECT * FROM order_role ora WHERE 1=1 AND ora.orderid = #{orderid} AND ora.isfinish = 'UNFINISHED' LIMIT 1
SELECT * FROM order_role ora WHERE 1=1 AND ora.roletype = #{roletype} AND ora.orderid = #{id} AND ora.count = 1
mapper.update: UPDATE order_role orole SET orole.count = 1 WHERE 1=1 AND orole.orderid = #{id} and orole.roletype = #{roletype}
UPDATE order_role orole SET orole.isfinish = 'ONGOING' WHERE 1=1 AND orole.isfinish = 'UNFINISHED' AND orole.orderid = #{orderid}
UPDATE order_role orole SET orole.isfinish = 'ONGOING' WHERE 1=1 AND orole.orderid = #{orderid} AND (orole.roletype = 'ROLE_TRANSIT_SEND' OR orole.roletype = 'ROLE_HOTEL_SEND')
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM order_role ora WHERE 1=1 AND ora.orderid = #{orderid} AND ora.roletype = #{roletype} ORDER BY ora.id desc LIMIT 1
SELECT * FROM order_role ore,order_main om WHERE 1=1 AND om.orderno = #{orderno} AND ore.orderid = om.id AND ore.isfinish in ('ONGOING','FINISHED')

SELECT id, orderid, roleid, roletype, isfinish, srctype, srcaddress, srcaddrname, srcaddrdesc, desttype, destaddress, destaddrname, destaddrdesc FROM order_role ora WHERE 1=1 AND ora.orderid = #{orderid} ORDER BY ora.id desc limit 1

SELECT id, orderid, roleid, roletype, isfinish, srctype, srcaddress, srcaddrname, srcaddrdesc, desttype, destaddress, destaddrname, destaddrdesc FROM order_role ora WHERE 1=1 AND ora.orderid = #{orderid} limit 1

SELECT DISTINCT oro.roleid userid, oro.travelstatus, (select codename from base_config bc where bc.codetype = 'TASKMAINDRIVERSTATUS' and bc.code = oro.travelstatus) travelstatusDesc, udm.id, udm.name drivername, udm.mobile drivermobile, udm.platenumber FROM order_role oro, user_delivery_man udm WHERE 1=1 AND oro.roleid = udm.userid AND oro.desttype = #{desttype} AND oro.destaddress = #{destaddress} AND oro.isfinish = 'ONGOING' AND oro.travelstatus in ('ARRIVING','ARRIVED')

SELECT au.name, au.mobile, ore.roletype, ore.desttype, ore.isfinish, ore.destaddrname, (select codename from base_config bc where bc.codetype='ROLETYPE' and bc.code = ore.roletype) roletypecodename, date_format(ore.actionfinishtime,'%Y年%m月%d日 %H时%i分') actionfinishtime FROM order_role ore, app_user au WHERE 1 = 1 AND ore.roleid = au.id
AND orderid = #{orderid}
AND orderid = (SELECT oBaggage.orderid FROM order_baggage oBaggage WHERE oBaggage.baggageid = #{baggageid} limit 1)
AND ore.desttype !='TRANSITCERTER' AND ore.isfinish in ('ONGOING','FINISHED')

SELECT ora.orderid, ora.roleid, ora.roletype, ora.isfinish, ora.srctype, ora.srcaddress, ora.srcaddrname, ora.srcaddrdesc, ora.desttype, ora.destaddress, ora.destaddrname, ora.destaddrdesc, UNIX_TIMESTAMP(ora.arrivedtime) arrivedtime FROM order_role ora WHERE 1=1 AND ora.orderid = #{orderid} AND ora.roleid = #{roleid} AND ora.isfinish = 'UNFINISHED' AND ora.roletype like '%SEND' ORDER BY ora.id desc LIMIT 1
SELECT * FROM order_role WHERE 1=1 AND id = #{orderroleid}

SELECT DISTINCT oro.destaddrdesc, oro.destgps FROM order_main om, order_role oro WHERE 1=1 AND om.id = oro.orderid AND om.status != 'CANCELLED' AND om.isvalid = 'Y' AND oro.desttype in ('HOTEL','RESIDENCE') AND oro.roletype = 'ROLE_HOTEL_TASK' AND oro.isfinish in ('UNFINISHED','ONGOING') AND date(oro.arrivedtime) = curdate()
AND oro.roleid = #{dmanuserid}

SELECT DISTINCT oro.destaddrdesc, oro.destgps FROM order_main om, order_role oro WHERE 1=1 AND om.id = oro.orderid AND om.status != 'CANCELLED' AND om.isvalid = 'Y' AND oro.desttype in ('HOTEL','RESIDENCE') AND oro.roletype = 'ROLE_HOTEL_SEND' AND oro.isfinish in ('UNFINISHED','ONGOING') AND date(oro.arrivedtime) = curdate()
AND oro.roleid = #{dmanuserid}

SELECT oro.* FROM order_role oro WHERE 1=1 AND oro.roleid = #{dmanuserid} AND oro.orderid = #{orderid} AND oro.roletype like '%TASK'
AND oro.isfinish in
#{item}
ORDER BY oro.id DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT oro.* FROM order_role oro WHERE 1=1 AND oro.roleid = #{dmanuserid} AND oro.orderid = #{orderid} AND oro.roletype like '%SEND'
AND oro.isfinish in
#{item}
ORDER BY oro.id DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT oro.roleid FROM order_role oro WHERE 1=1 AND oro.orderid = #{orderid} AND oro.roletype = 'ROLE_TRANSIT_TASK' AND oro.desttype = 'TRANSITCERTER' AND oro.destaddress = #{destaddress} ORDER BY oro.id desc LIMIT 1
mapper.update: UPDATE order_role oro SET oro.roletype = #{roletype}, oro.desttype = #{desttype}, oro.destaddress = #{address}, oro.destaddrname= #{addrname}, oro.destaddrdesc = #{addrdesc}, oro.destgps = #{destgps} WHERE 1=1 AND oro.id = #{id}
UPDATE order_role oro SET oro.roleid = #{roleid} WHERE 1=1 AND oro.id in (#{taskid},#{sendid}) AND oro.isfinish != 'FINISHED'
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT oro.destaddrdesc FROM order_role oro where 1=1 AND oro.orderid = #{orderid}
SELECT oro.* FROM order_role oro where 1=1 AND oro.orderid = #{orderid}
SELECT DISTINCT oro.roleid FROM order_role oro WHERE 1=1 AND oro.orderid = #{orderid} AND (oro.roletype like '%TASK' OR oro.roletype like '%SEND')
mapper.update: UPDATE order_role orole SET orole.arrivedtime = #{arrivedtime} WHERE 1=1 AND orole.orderid = #{orderid} AND (orole.roletype = 'ROLE_AIRPORT_TASK' OR orole.roletype = 'ROLE_HOTEL_TASK')
UPDATE order_role orole SET orole.arrivedtime = #{arrivedtime} WHERE 1=1 AND orole.orderid = #{orderid} AND (orole.roletype = 'ROLE_AIRPORT_SEND' OR orole.roletype = 'ROLE_HOTEL_SEND')

UPDATE order_role orole SET orole.desttype = #{desttype}, orole.destaddress = #{destaddress}, orole.destaddrname = #{destaddrname}, orole.destaddrdesc = #{destaddrdesc}, orole.destgps = #{destgps} WHERE 1=1 AND orole.orderid = #{orderid} AND (orole.roletype = 'ROLE_AIRPORT_TASK' OR orole.roletype = 'ROLE_HOTEL_TASK')

UPDATE order_role orole SET orole.desttype = #{desttype}, orole.destaddress = #{destaddress}, orole.destaddrname = #{destaddrname}, orole.destaddrdesc = #{destaddrdesc}, orole.destgps = #{destgps} WHERE 1=1 AND orole.orderid = #{orderid} AND (orole.roletype = 'ROLE_AIRPORT_SEND' OR orole.roletype = 'ROLE_HOTEL_SEND')
